title: Maze War
brief_description: Without Maze War, there wouldn’t be any first-person shooter videogames like Quake or Doom. Developed by Steve Cooley for NASA, Maze War featured forward, backwards, left and right movements, as well as first-person perspective.

constellations_other.name: Capturing first-person POV
constellations_other.description: A comparison of how videogames and feature films have used first person POV shots and sequences and how (for the latter) camera technology has impacted on this.
